Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Eidenhoft Boulevard, west of the Fellowship Hall.
Room.LongDescription: The Fellowship Hall is an odd religious society that is profound in believing that the world is going to end tomorrow. Most religions say that the world will eventually end, say in two thousand years, give or take a few centuries, but the Fellowship is the only cult which believes armageddon comes tomorrow, and are constantly annoyed that they wake up each morning.
